___story_elements_correction_json.description: Describes a change that has been made to the document for transparency, or describes inaccuracies or falsehoods that remain in the document.

correction_type.description: Type of correction. E.g., clarification, retraction.

___story_elements_correction_json.title: Correction

trait_additional_properties_json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
trait_additional_properties_json.title: Has additional properties

trait_alignment_json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
trait_alignment_json.title: Alignment

trait_channel_json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
trait_channel_json.title: Channel trait

trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

trait_subtype_json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
trait_subtype_json.title: Subtype or Template

description: Trait that applies a list of corrections to a document.
title: Corrections
